message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  $800,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $700,000.  This product is very valuable to me, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $750,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
